document.full_text: rocker james durbin, fighting tears of disbelief, was thrown off "american idol" on thursday as viewers chose their top 3 on the tv singing show.
document.title: tearful rocker james durbin exits "american idol"
lines_and_colors: rocker james durbin, fighting tears of disbelief, was thrown off "american idol" on thursday as viewers chose their top 3 on the tv singing show.
